data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD = ' ' and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER and @cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.TYPE = 'AP' and T2.START_DATE <= @startDate and T2.END_DATE >= @startDate ) and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER and @cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'CH' and T3.START_DATE <= @startDate and T3.END_DATE >= @startDate )

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, CS_DUE_AMT, CS_COLLECTED_AMT, PAYING_CASE_IND, PATERNITY_EST_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 with(xlock) where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber and CURRENT_CS_IND = ' '

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, CS_DUE_AMT, CS_COLLECTED_AMT, PAYING_CASE_IND, PATERNITY_EST_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CURRENT_CS_IND = ' '

data.name: ReadDebtDebtDetailCsePersonCsePerson
data.value: select T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OB_TRN_ID, T1.OB_TRN_TYP, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T1.OTY_TYPE, T2.DUE_DT, T2.CREATED_TMST from CKT_OB_TRN T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T2 with(readuncommitted) on (T2.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and T2.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_TYPE and T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = T2.OTR_TYPE and T1.OB_TRN_ID = T2.OTR_GENERATED_ID and T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE and T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T1.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER is not null and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' and T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S' where exists ( select * from CKT_OBLIGATION T5 with(readuncommitted) where T5.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T1.OTY_TYPE and T5.OB_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T5.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER and T5.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE and T5.PRIM_SEC_CD <> 'S' and @dtyGeneratedId = T5.DTY_GENERATED_ID and T5.CSP_NUMBER > @cspNumber and T5.CPA_TYPE = 'R' ) order by T1.CSP_NUMBER

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_CD = 'CS' and EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt and DISCONTINUE_DT >= @effectiveDt

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set CURRENT_CS_IND = @currentCsInd where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set CURRENT_CS_IND = @currentCsInd, OTHER_OBG_IND = @otherObgInd where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber
